display_long_description:
Step into the exhilarating world of **Summer Games - VR Sports** on Oculus, the ultimate VR sports experience! Perfect for all skill levels, this dynamic game offers easy, medium, and hard modes. Compete in a variety of exciting events such as dart throw, javelin throw, shot put, disc throw, Hammer Throw, and more coming soon!


Enjoy flexible gameplay options by playing solo or challenging AI players for a realistic competition. With stunning graphics, realistic physics, and intuitive controls, every event feels incredibly lifelike. Push your limits, set new records, and climb the leaderboards in this immersive virtual sports festival. Dive into the Summer Games today and experience the thrill like never before!  

  

# Features
* Play in VR(Virtual Reality) or MR (Mixed Reality)
* Different summer games like shot put, dart, discus throw, hammer throw, javelin throw
* Different game modes easy to challenging 
* Play solo or with AI players
* Different skins to unlock in game
* Realistic physics and amazing graphics

Experience the thrill of summer sports like never before! 'Summer Games' is a VR game that puts you on the field for a series of fun and challenging athletic events
